definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: His mother quilted a cotton-padded anorak for him.
sentences.chinese: 他的母亲给他缝制了一件棉猴儿。

sentences.english: I play with my children like am if I get time.
sentences.chinese: 闲暇时间和孩子玩耍，像只猴儿。

sentences.english: Then make fox blunt understand lu monkey is froudes kill vowed to kill him.
sentences.chinese: 这时令狐冲明白了陆猴儿是劳德诺杀的发誓要杀了他。

sentences.english: Hussein: No, I'm not going to make myself dirty.
sentences.chinese: 我不去，我可没打算把自己弄成泥猴儿。

definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1], the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
to get a monkey to perform tricks/to put on a monkey show/to make fun of sb/to tease
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
